item.title: 据说 CTBC 考虑退出新光在台湾的收购战
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，CTBC 金融控股公司（CTBC Financial Holding Co.【原文：CTBC Financial Holding Co. is set to decide against a fresh offer for Shin Kong Financial Holding Co., according to people familiar with the situation, paving the way for rival Taishin Financial Holding Co. to move ahead with one of the biggest combinations in Taiwan’s financial industry in years.】

item.title: 中国人民银行继续保持关键贷款利率不变
item.description: 中国的银行维持 9 月份的基准贷款利率不变，因为政策制定者暂不采取进一步的货币刺激措施，而金融机构则在创纪录的低利润率中挣扎。【原文：Chinese banks maintained their benchmark lending rates for September, as policymakers hold off on further monetary stimulus while financial institutions struggle with record-low profit margins.】

item.title: 苹果 iPhone 16 上市，却未配备备受期待的人工智能功能
item.description: 苹果公司正面临着前所未有的挑战：说服客户购买没有最大新功能的最新款 iPhone。【原文：Apple Inc. is facing an unprecedented challenge: persuading customers to buy its latest iPhones without their biggest new feature.】

item.title: 美团股价大涨 63% 面临中国消费萎靡带来的风险
item.description: 即使在经济放缓拖累同行的情况下，美团专注于低价的战略仍帮助这家中国食品外卖公司实现了销售目标。投资者现在想知道，随着宏观经济疲软的加深，美团股价的大幅上涨能否持续。【原文：Meituan’s strategy to focus on lower prices has helped the Chinese food delivery company beat sales targets even as the slowing economy drags peers. Investors are now wondering whether its steep share-price gains can last as the macro weakness deepens.】

item.title: 印度达斯以 6,890 亿美元储备驯服一度动荡的卢比
item.description: 印度央行行长达斯（Shaktikanta Das）完成了一项罕见的平衡之举：在抑制卢比波动的同时，允许卢比走低，以帮助总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）实现出口目标。【原文：India’s central bank chief Shaktikanta Das has pulled off a rare balancing act: Clamping down on volatility in the rupee while allowing it to drift lower to aid Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s export ambitions.】

item.title: 美联储减息后，石油将创二月以来最大单周涨幅
item.description: 在美联储大幅降息后，石油有望创下 2 月份以来的最大单周涨幅，而交易商则继续关注中东一触即发的紧张局势。【原文：Oil was on track for the biggest weekly advance since February after a steep interest-rate cut by the Federal Reserve, while traders continued to monitor simmering tensions in the Middle East.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好美国股市再创新高。英格兰银行的目标是循序渐进。蓬勃发展的私人信贷市场面临逆风。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. US stocks hit fresh highs. The Bank of England aims for a gradual approach. Headwinds face a booming private credit market. Here’s what’s moving markets. —Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 巴菲特持有的剩余 340 亿美元美国银行股份现在是纯利润
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）不断出售美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：Warren Buffett’s continued disposals of Bank of America Corp. shares have now covered the billionaire’s investment cost, leaving him with a more than $34 billion stake that’s pure profit.】

item.title: 美的香港首秀后值得关注的亿万富豪企业
item.description: 香港三年多来最大规模的股票抛售让人们对中国沉睡的亿万富翁交易管道重现生机充满希望。【原文：Hong Kong’s biggest share sale in more than three years is fueling hopes China’s dormant billionaire deal pipeline may come back to life.】

item.title: 恒大清盘人寻求对拥有关键资产的恒大集团进行清盘
item.description: 全球负债最多的建筑商中国恒大集团的清算人正重返香港法院，试图对拥有关键资产的子公司进行清算。【原文：Liquidators of China Evergrande Group, the world’s most indebted builder, are returning to a Hong Kong court as they attempt to wind up a subsidiary with key assets.】

item.title: 市场综述：股市反弹波及亚洲，日元在日本央行会议前持平
item.description: 由于就业数据支持了美联储能够实现美国经济软着陆的观点，亚洲股市将延续推动全球股市创下新高的涨势。日元汇率持稳，因为交易商在为日本的通胀数据和利率决定做准备。【原文：Asia was set to extend a rally that pushed global stocks to fresh highs as jobs data supported the view the Federal Reserve can engineer a soft landing for the US economy. The yen was steady as traders prepare for inflation data and an interest rate decision in Japan.】

item.title: 韩国即将推出的 "价值提升指数 "股票交易指南
item.description: 投资者正在从韩国推出的 "价值提升指数"（Value-Up Index）中寻找潜在的股市赢家，该指数是韩国政府推动改善公司治理和提高股东回报的一项重要措施。【原文：Investors are looking for potential stock-market winners from South Korea’s launch of the Value-Up Index, a key plank of the government’s push for better corporate governance and improved shareholder returns.】

item.title: 雷蒙德-秦（Raymond Chun）的道明集团首席执行官之路未受美国麻烦的玷污
item.description: 雷蒙德-秦（Raymond Chun）在通往多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）最高职位的不寻常道路上，避开了困扰加拿大第二大银行的美国反洗钱问题。【原文：Raymond Chun’s unlikely path to the top job at Toronto-Dominion Bank steered well clear of the US anti-money laundering troubles plaguing Canada’s second-largest lender.】

item.title: OpenAI 将决定让哪些支持者参与 65 亿美元融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，OpenAI 的最新筹款活动已接近尾声，潜在投资者将于周五获知他们是否会参与这笔交易。【原文：OpenAI’s latest fundraising is nearing completion, with prospective investors set to find out Friday whether they’ll be part of the deal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亚当-诺伊曼的福禄（Flow）公司首次全球扩张，进军沙特阿拉伯
item.description: 亚当-诺伊曼（Adam Neumann）首次将其新成立的住宅房地产公司推向全球，在沙特阿拉伯开展新项目。【原文：Adam Neumann is expanding his new residential real estate company globally for the first time with new projects in Saudi Arabia.】

item.title: 萨默斯认为美联储利率预测将被颠覆，抵押贷款利率将上升
item.description: 前财政部长劳伦斯-萨默斯（Lawrence Summers）表示，通胀可能会阻碍美联储在未来几年内如期降低利率。【原文：Former Treasury Secretary Lawrence Summers said inflation will probably prevent the Federal Reserve from lowering interest rates as much as expected in coming years.】

item.title: 泰铢创 1998 年以来最大涨幅，威胁泰国旅游业和出口业
item.description: 泰国铢将创下自亚洲金融危机以来的最大季度涨幅，有可能破坏该国主要旅游业和出口业的复苏。【原文：Thailand’s baht is on course for its biggest quarterly gain since the Asian financial crisis, threatening to derail a recovery in the nation’s key tourism and export industries.】

item.title: 寻呼机爆炸敲响全球供应链安全警钟
item.description: 数以千计的寻呼机和其他设备本周在黎巴嫩爆炸，标志着利用供应链打击对手的新一轮致命升级，为全球领导人减少对竞争对手技术依赖的努力带来了新的紧迫性。【原文：Thousands of pagers and other devices exploding in Lebanon this week mark a new and deadly escalation in the use of supply chains against adversaries, giving new urgency to global leaders’ drive to reduce their dependence on technologies from rivals.】

item.title: Salesforce 首席执行官表示，人工智能代理意味着客户无需 "自己动手"。
item.description: Salesforce Inc.首席执行官马克-贝尼奥夫（Marc Benioff）表示，该公司新推出的人工智能软件是为希望利用这一新兴技术的企业客户提供的一整套解决方案。【原文：Salesforce Inc. Chief Executive Officer Marc Benioff said his company’s newly introduced artificial intelligence software is a complete package for business customers seeking to take advantage of the emerging technology.】

item.title: 环球音乐的宏伟流媒体愿景需要合作
item.description:
该公司本周向投资者提出了 "流媒体 2.0 "的构想。要实现这一目标，需要业界各利益相关方通力合作。【原文：

The company pitched its idea for “Streaming 2.0” to investors this week. Pulling it off will require various industry stakeholders to cooperate.

】

item.title: 特朗普现在可以套现其低迷的股票了。但他承诺不会
item.description: 禁止唐纳德-特朗普出售其媒体公司股票的限制措施周四到期，他终于可以将其持有的超过 17 亿美元的股份变为现金。问题只有两个：出售股票并不简单，而且他已经承诺不会这么做。【原文：Donald Trump can finally turn his more than $1.7 billion stake in his media company into cash after restrictions preventing him from selling the stock expired Thursday. There are only two problems: Unloading the shares won’t be simple, and he already promised not to do it.】

item.title: 摩根大通任命科技和医疗银行业务新主席和主管
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is reshuffling its top management across technology and health-care investment banking, elevating new leaders of two of its most important franchises.】

item.title: Vista 支持的 Alegeus 希望通过放弃私人债务节约成本
item.description: Alegeus Technologies 希望通过对 Vista Equity Partners 用于在 2018 年将该公司私有化的私人贷款进行再融资，节省约 7500 万美元的利息，因为在公开市场上，该贷款的定价仍然具有竞争力。【原文：Alegeus Technologies is looking to score about $75 million in interest savings through refinancing the private loan that Vista Equity Partners used to take the company private in 2018 as pricing remains competitive in public markets.】

item.title: 瑞银认为哈里斯获胜将解除公用事业债务，特朗普将促进能源发展
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS）信贷策略主管马修-米什（Matthew Mish）认为，卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）在美国总统大选中获胜将提振基础工业、资本货物公司和公用事业公司的债券。【原文：A Kamala Harris victory in the US presidential election would boost the bonds of basic industry, capital goods companies and utilities, according to Matthew Mish, head of credit strategy at UBS.】

item.title: OpenAI 的新推理模型令学者和高管兴奋不已
item.description:
对于向 ChatGPT 咨询食谱和旅行信息的普通用户而言，这些改进可能不太明显。【原文：

The improvements may be less obvious to regular users asking ChatGPT for recipes and travel information.

】

item.title: 特朗普的关税计划远不足以填补预算漏洞
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）曾承诺利用大规模的新关税来资助从减税到儿童保育的一切项目。但经济学家表示，新的进口关税不太可能带来他所需要的收入增长。【原文：Donald Trump has promised to use sweeping new tariffs to fund everything from tax cuts to child care. But economists say the new import charges are unlikely to create anything close to the revenue boom he would need.】

item.title: Platinum Equity 正在洽谈收购包装制造商 Trivium
item.description: 知情人士透露，Platinum Equity 正在洽谈以超过 35 亿美元的价格收购 Trivium Packaging NV。【原文：Platinum Equity is in talks to buy Trivium Packaging NV for more than $3.5 billion, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 中国市场前景恶化，斯凯奇跌幅创 2020 年以来最大
item.description: 美国斯凯奇公司（Skechers U.S.A. Inc.【原文：Skechers U.S.A. Inc. shares are delivering their worst daily performance since the coronavirus pandemic after the footwear company’s chief financial officer told an industry conference that China sales will be under pressure the rest of the year.】

item.title: Palantir 赢得美国 1 亿美元人工智能瞄准技术合同
item.description: Palantir Technologies Inc.赢得了一份价值 1 亿美元的合同，这份合同将使更多的美军人员获得人工智能瞄准工具，使他们能够使用该公司的数字战争平台。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc. has won a $100 million contract that will extend access to artificial intelligence targeting tools to more US military personnel, giving them access to the company’s digital warfare platform.】

item.title: 霍华德-卢特尼克对芝加哥商品交易所财政主导地位的挑战转为政治挑战
item.description: 美国国债市场份额的争夺战又多了一重政治色彩。【原文：The battle for market share in US Treasuries is getting an extra dose of politics.】
